svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

path.style: stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); animation: 500ms linear 0s infinite normal none running ge-flow-animation-SLaFGzWfHa-uvb6T54Pp; stroke-dashoffset: 16;

div.div: 2. Subnet Boardcasting: - means boardcasting to local network only. eg: - if my subnet is 10.144.116.0/24 then subnet boardcast address is 10.144.116.255
